Articles.Content:
Hi. I did do a search for this but didn't see anything about this.

I built a rocket that's giving me an error message when I try to launch it.

"Craft has too many parts! The Vehicle Assembly Building cant support vessels over 30 parts. Unable to launch."

Well, when I go outside of the building and click on all the building itself it says 'facility level 3' and 'fully upgraded' 'max parts supported unlimited'.

Something up im not aware of?

Thanks,

JP

Edited February 1, 2015 by halcyon
This is a known bug with the x64 version of KSP. Please use the x86 (32-bit) version. If the problem persists, then we can troubleshoot.

This is a known bug with the x64 version of KSP. Please use the x86 (32-bit) version. If the problem persists, then we can troubleshoot.

It is indeed the 64 bit version im using. Does it do this with the 64bit Linux as well, or just with windows?

Thanks for the prompt reply. Ill consider this answered.

It is indeed the 64 bit version im using. Does it do this with the 64bit Linux as well, or just with windows?

Thanks for the prompt reply. Ill consider this answered.

Just Windows, x64 Linux is fine.
The windows 64 bit version is buggy, don't use it
